item.title: Semantic Versioning Simplified
item.description:
Software Versioning makes it easy and convenient to track, test, deploy, patch, and rollback features, enhancements and bug/fixes across variety of environmentsin Software Supply Chain.

Semantic Versioning provides an efficient and effective framework to version the software products, so that the infamous Dependency Hell can be avoided.
